ble.holdToPair: Press and hold the Beybattle Pass button
ble.nativeHoldToConnect: Press and hold the Beybattle Pass button to connect.
ble.connectTimeout: Connection timed out. Tap connect first, then press and hold the Beybattle Pass button.
ble.deviceNotFound: Beybattle Pass not found. Tap connect first, then press and hold the Beybattle Pass button.
ble.connectFailed: Connection failed. Tap connect first, then press and hold the Beybattle Pass button.
ble.initFailed: Bluetooth initialization failed. Restart the app and reconnect.
ble.notAvailable: Bluetooth is not available on this device.

mobile.settingsDesc: Launcher selection and Beybattle Pass connection
mobile.guideAfterConnect: Attach the bey and shoot. You can continue shooting.
mobile.swipeHint: Swipe left/right, or tap the dots below to move pages

recent.title: Shot Analysis
recent.description: Detect shots and show shot power and waveform

history.title: History & Analysis
history.description: Analyze characteristics by band from past data
history.confirmReset: Delete all history data. This cannot be undone. Continue?
history.summary: Shot power stats: total {{total}} shots / avg {{avg}} rpm / max {{max}} rpm / SD {{stddev}}

decode.checksumMissing: Cannot recompute because B0..B6 is incomplete
decode.checksumRule: Rule: checksum is low 8 bits of sum(B0..B6, Off1..16)

maxTau.label: Max Input Torque (Relative)
maxTau.line1: Meaning: Peak estimated input torque during a shot (relative scale)
maxTau.line2: High: stronger initial input trend / Low: weaker initial input trend
maxTau.line3: Note: judge trends across multiple shots

t_peak.label: t_peak
t_peak.line1: Meaning: Time from shot start to peak rotation (ms)
t_peak.line2: High: slower rise / Low: faster rise

t_50.label: t_50
t_50.line1: Meaning: Time to reach 50% of peak (ms)
t_50.line2: High: slow initial build / Low: quick initial build

slope_max.label: slope_max
slope_max.line1: Meaning: Maximum increase rate of rotation
slope_max.line2: High: sharp acceleration / Low: gentle acceleration

auc_0_peak.label: auc_0_peak
auc_0_peak.line1: Meaning: Total rotation from 0 to first peak
auc_0_peak.line2: High: better build-up to peak / Low: weak opening
auc_0_peak.line3: Improve: keep output continuous to peak

spike_score.label: spike_score
spike_score.line3: Improve: avoid abrupt stops in pull

early_input_ratio.label: early_input_ratio
early_input_ratio.line1: Meaning: Share of input concentrated in early phase
early_input_ratio.line2: High: front-loaded / Low: more late input
early_input_ratio.line3: Improve: reduce early over-bias for stable input

late_input_ratio.label: late_input_ratio
late_input_ratio.line1: Meaning: Share of input near peak
late_input_ratio.line2: High: late-rising tendency / Low: input spent early
late_input_ratio.line3: Improve: tune late growth for target band

peak_input_time.label: peak_input_time
peak_input_time.line1: Meaning: Time when input acceleration is maximum (ms)
peak_input_time.line2: High: peak later / Low: peak earlier

input_stability.label: input_stability
input_stability.line2: High: larger force fluctuations / Low: steadier pull
